Welcome to the suburb of the future.

Surrounded by parklands of green open spaces, YarraBend is a visionary, riverside suburb just 6.5km from Melbourne CBD. With its unique combination of open spaces and cutting edge design, YarraBend is where new technology and old traditions meet.

YarraBend will be a world first TESLA suburb by including Tesla Powerwalls within houses. YarraBend has been designed to achieve the highest level of sustainability and quality of life.

Lush green spaces.

YarraBend is surrounded by Darebin Parklands and Yarra Bend Park, with views over endless canopies of native trees. Here you can lose yourself walking in the natural bushland or jogging past the area’s last remaining orchards.

Future focused.

With a strong focus around sustainability and design, at YarraBend innovation leads the way ensuring its future-proofed. With latest technology like PV energy and TESLA Powerwalls to meticulous horticultural designs and the latest in street design, YarraBend will be a green and sustainable place that exists in harmony with the natural environment

Local knowledge.

As well as offering its own modern primary school, YarraBend puts you within easy reach of the highest concentration of well-regarded educational institutions in Australia, from kindergartens through to private school.

Local flavour.

YarraBend will be a new Melbourne food destination known for its acclaimed chefs and on-trend dining sensations. A world of flavours and a variety of dining styles will be curated by an industry icon to create a new and exit.

Heidie Museum

Arts & culture.

Art will be a major focus in the design of YarraBend, with an Art and Design Precinct that celebrates local and international artists through exhibitions, workshops and interactive pop-ups.

Shopping destination.

With everything from major supermarkets to chic designer boutiques, YarraBend will cater to every need of its new and diverse community. Local fashion brands high-end labels, gift shops and florists will all create a village atmosphere in the heart of YarraBend.

On the edge of Kew.

YarraBend is conveniently located only 450m from Alphington Railway Station, with platforms shaded by heritage listed trees Red Gums that pre-date European settlement. Fairfield Railway Station, adjacent to charming shopping village is also less than 15 minutes away by foot.

YarraBend

Welcome to YarraBend; a new and upcoming Glenvill development that aims to offer the lifestyle you have been dreaming about. YarraBend is an eco-conscious community that offers tech-friendly services, recreational facilities, lush greenery and ultra modern designer homes, all located less than 7km from the heart of the Melbourne CBD.

Along with plush surroundings, the houses in YarraBend are unlike anything you have experienced before. Each home in YarraBend is designed by world-class architects and landscapers and can be uniquely tailored to suit your every whim and fancy.

All properties are also constructed from sustainable materials and feature solar PV energy and Tesla Powerwalls, which means your YarraBend property will stand the test of time and revolutionise the way homes are built for years to come. Whether you are looking for a designer home or simply want to buy into the amazing YarraBend community, we have a range of options to suit you.

Houses & Townhouses YarraBend

Over the years, Glenvill homes have become some of the most prestigious and highly sought after properties in the world. If you are looking for an impeccable family home or townhouse located just outside of the Melbourne CBD, YarraBend is the perfect destination.

All of the houses for sale in YarraBend are ultra-modern and stylish, yet still offer a traditional, old-world charm that is hard to come by. They also include all the amenities you are looking for such as, european appliances, stone bench tops, entertainment areas and stunning views.

Each designer home in YarraBend can be tailored to suit every taste and style, and also feature that signature Glenvill look. What sets YarraBend apart from the rest however, is the innovation that goes into every new house and townhouse in the area. This includes energy efficient lighting, Tesla Powerwalls, solar panels, high- speed internet capabilities and also a personalised app that offers information about the community and social events. When you purchase house and land in YarraBend, you are also buying into a health-centred neighbourhood that provides access to outdoor areas, recreational facilities and playgrounds.

Select homes and townhouses in YarraBend also come with beautiful views of the iconic Yarra River, making this new suburb of Melbourne a highly desirable place to live. Homes for sale in YarraBend are already in high demand, so interested buyers are encouraged to act quickly to avoid missing out on this once in a lifetime opportunity.

Apartments YarraBend

If you are looking to be close to the city yet still enjoy the comforts of suburban living, YarraBend is the perfect destination. Located close to the prestigious suburb of Kew and less than 7km from the Melbourne CBD, the new development of YarraBend is a community like no other. Created to appeal to the Melbourne lifestyle, YarraBend offers health and wellness facilities, is tech savvy and offers eco-conscious designer apartments suitable for all tastes and styles.

Apartments in YarraBend also feature Tesla Powerwalls, alfresco entertainment areas, stone bench tops, european appliances and can be tailored to your specific needs and desires.

Owning an apartment in this highly sought after suburb is also an excellent investment and one that will keep delivering rewards year after year. This is because the YarraBend facilities, location and lifestyle appeal to everyone including families, young couples, the elderly and singles. Whether you are looking for a designer apartment or investment property, Yarra Bend truly has it all.

If you are looking for a visionary lifestyle that offers everything from lush greenery to tech savvy living and modern dwellings, YarraBend is truly the perfect place to call home.
